citations.narrative:
*** The fencing for the kangaroo yard needs to be addressed. A post is unstable and is causing the fence line to lean in
towards the enclosure. This fence needs to be maintained in good repair to keep the enclosure structurally sound for the
safety of the animals.
*** The shelter structure at the back section of the kangaroo yard has siding that is in disrepair and needs to be fixed for
the safety of the animals and to keep the structure in good repair.
Correct by: June 10, 2023
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.125(a) 
   
Facilities, general. 
*** The fencing for the kangaroo yard needs to be addressed. A post is unstable and is causing the fence line to lean in 
towards the enclosure. This fence needs to be maintained in good repair to keep the enclosure structurally sound for the 
safety of the animals.  
 
*** The shelter structure at the back section of the kangaroo yard has siding that is in disrepair and needs to be fixed for 
the safety of the animals and to keep the structure in good repair.  
 
Correct by: June 10, 2023 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
